mapper.insert: insert into member (member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_email, member_phone, member_reg_date) values (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, sysdate())
mapper.select: select count(member_id) from member where member_id = #{id}
select count(member_phone) from member where member_phone = #{phone}
select count(*) from member where member_id = #{id} and member_pw = #{pw}
